mapper.select: select * from ( select wr.wan_receive_date as 'wanReceiveDateString', DATE_FORMAT(wr.wan_receive_date, '%m/%d') as 'wanReceiveDate', wr.wan_receive as 'wanReceive', wr.week_receive_rate as 'weekReceiveRate' from fund_wan_receive wr where wr.trade_type = 'ea' order by wr.wan_receive_date desc limit 0, #{count} ) abc order by abc.wanReceiveDateString

select * from ( select wr.wan_receive_date as 'wanReceiveDateString', DATE_FORMAT(wr.wan_receive_date, '%m/%d') as 'wanReceiveDate', wr.wan_receive as 'wanReceive', wr.week_receive_rate as 'weekReceiveRate' from fund_wan_receive wr where wr.trade_type = 'ta' order by wr.wan_receive_date desc limit 0, #{count} ) abc order by abc.wanReceiveDateString
